entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
